item.description:
Hello All!

Member Mike McCool is having a show at Trader Joe's! Go check it out this weekend!

The show is Saturday-Sunday July 25-26 from 11:00 AM until 3:00
PM. Apart from photos by me (with cryptic text by my daughter
the author) there will photos by Matt Cousens and Dina Godzik
and various oil/ acrylic paintings, poetry and fabrics. food
will be served!

Have a fun weekend.

Mike

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Mike McCool Photo Exhibit at Trader Joes in Shrewsbury
